content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-83 to -87)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-83.0), (41.0,-86.0)
- 4 Wooden chests collecting coal at positions (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5), (40.5,-87.5)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5) and (35.5,-85.5) moving coal between chests

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining Setup at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Mining setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining iron and copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) collecting ore
- Burner inserter at (-26.5,-59.5) moving ore from chest
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0) for smelting
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) collecting plates

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-6 to -10, y=-57 to -60)
Large mining setup with:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5) collecting ore
- Transport belt system connecting components
- Multiple burner inserters moving materials

### Smelting Array at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Large smelting setup consisting of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at positions (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters moving materials between components

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17.5 to 27.5)
Power setup consisting of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5) providing water
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0) heating water
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5) generating power
- Pipe network connecting components
- Small electric pole network distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Errors
- Ensure mining drills and other burner entities have fuel before expecting them to work
- Keep track of coal supply and distribution to prevent "out of fuel" errors

### Item Movement Errors
- When extracting items, verify the source container has the items you're trying to extract
- Check if destination containers have space before attempting to insert items
- Ensure inserters have proper pickup and drop positions configured

### Fluid System Errors
- Connect all fluid-carrying entities (pipes, boilers, pumps) properly to ensure fluid flow
- Monitor fluid levels and connections to prevent "no fluid present" errors

### Space Management Errors
- Check if chests are full before attempting to add more items
- Monitor chest capacities and implement overflow prevention
